text: Ferrara Candy Company is an American candy company. It is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. It is owned by the Ferrero Group. The company was created from a 2012 merger of the Illinois-based Ferrara Pan Candy Company and Minnesota-based Farley's & Sathers Candy Company. Its product line includes the brands of Ferrara-branded pan candy and those of Farley's & Sathers.
